values: CMIP6
ES: Surface emissions (and 3-D concentrations away from the surface) derived via the model from the prescribed surface concentration

Zonal mean surface mixing ratios are prescribed in the lower troposphere and in the stratosphere following the CMIP6 time series, using Newtonian relaxation. A one-year delay is applied between the surface and the stratosphere. Anthropogenic and biomass burning emissions of methane are prescribed using the CMIP6 data set; natural emissions and uptake by soils are prescribed to a monthly climatology. The effective total emissions are determined by the combination of the prescribed fluxes and the tendencies applied in the relaxation scheme.
